actions.name: Power of Alchemy

cost.trigger: An allied creature gains @Affliction[fainted] or the user is switched in to replace a @Affliction[fainted] ally.

actions.description:
Trigger: An allied creature gains @Affliction[fainted] or the user is switched in to replace a @Affliction[fainted] ally.

Effect: The user copies 1 Ability a @Affliction[fainted] allied creature has and replaces Power of Alchemy with it for the rest of combat. Copied abilities with a Trigger that requires the user to switch in activate with this effect. [Legendary], [Innate], and [Forme Change] abilities cannot be copied.
